title: Keir Starmer – 2022 Comments on Lula Winning Brazilian Election
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Keir Starmer, the Leader of the Opposition, on 31 October 2022.
content:
Congratulations to [@LulaOficial](https://twitter.com/LulaOficial) on the great news of his election as President of Brazil. This win must also be the start of a new era of global cooperation and action in the fight against climate change.
